greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = C(n)*(10n+1) where C(n)=Catalan numbers (A000108).
reference: A. H. Beiler, Recreations in the Theory of Numbers, Dover, N.Y., 1964, pp. 194-196.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: E.g.f.: exp(2*x)*(I_0(2*x) + 9*I_1(2*x)), where I_n(x) is the modified Bessel function of the first kind.
results.author: _Barry E. Williams_, Dec 27 1999
ext: Corrected and extended by _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 19 2011
